```{r}
library(imputeTS)

set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species))
```
## Question 1 
```{r}
replacenavalues = function(x) { 
  if (is.numeric(x)) {
    (na_mean(x, option = "mean", maxgap = Inf)) } 
  else if (is.character(x)) {
    (replace_na(x, "virginica"))}
}
```

```{r}
output = map(iris_with_missing, replacenavalues)
```
## Question 2
```{r}
df1 = 
  tibble(observations = list.files(path = "data/", pattern = "csv", all.files = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)) %>% 
  mutate(data = map(observations, read_csv)) %>% 
  unnest() %>% 
  mutate(
  observations = str_remove(observations,".csv"),
  observations = str_remove(observations,"data//")) %>% 
  separate(observations, into = c("Arm", "Subject ID"), sep="_(?=[^_]+$)")
```
